main.name: Duc-Hoang Do
main.bio: From Belgium, with a passion for soccer, a knack for front-end, and a love for traveling. I enjoy the outdoors, whether it's hanging out with friends, going on a new adventure, or trying out a new sport. I recently graduated from a Full-Stack Web Developer Bootcamp and am seeking new job opportunities in Seattle.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: Bachelors in Communication and International Relations
